Title: Who Are You Going to Telephone?
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Chris Bishop, Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: As Adam (Sean Giambrone) abandons Pops (George Segal) to go trick-or-treating with a cool new friend, Beverly (Wendy McLendon-Covey) dons a costume so she can keep Barry (Troy Gentile) from being embarrassed at a Halloween party.
